Test automation entails the automatic assessment and validation of a software product, such as a web application, to ensure it adheres to predetermined quality criteria encompassing code style, functionality, and user experience.

Test automation helps in reducing regression testing time and cutting down the time to market with significant cost savings on a long-term basis. However, a clear automation strategy and roadmap are key to ensuring the right return on investment on your automation initiatives. With disparate application architecture, multiple environments, third-party integrations, and multiple user devices in software development, a standardized and consistent automation approach is needed to ensure high reusability, ease of maintenance and lower upfront costs.

As an automation testing service provider with experience of advising clients on software test automation services and architecting their automation journey, TestingXperts is one of the leading software automation testing services companies in the UK that generates the value you always wanted through test automation.
